channel.title: New IoT Card - EnOcean battery free sensors
channel.description:
This new IoT card utilizes a certified EnOcean module TCM515U which runs at 902MHz for North America. Other versions run at 868MHz for EU and 928MHz for Japan.
**TCM515U** https://www.enocean.com/en/products/enocean_modules_902mhz/tcm-515u/
**Sensors** https://www.enocean.com/en/products/enocean_modules_902mhz/ for a plethora of batteryless sensors focused on building automation (room occupancy/environment/security).
**Free Dev Tools** https://www.enocean.com/en/support/download/
**Buy here** https://www.digikey.com/products/en?keywords=talon%20enocean
[Talon mangOH EnOcean Module Brief 2019.pdf|attachment](upload://hoyBrn4kr8841F5lsDpH4b4NgCP.pdf) (284.2 KB)

item.title: New IoT Card - EnOcean battery free sensors
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description:
This new IoT card utilizes a certified EnOcean module TCM515U which runs at 902MHz for North America. Other versions run at 868MHz for EU and 928MHz for Japan.

TCM515U

EnOcean

EnOcean for USA/ Canada: 902 MHz - TCM 515U

Energy harvesting wireless sensor modules, Receiver and transceiver modules and accessories in 902 MHz for self-powered wireless switches, sensors and controls.

Sensors

EnOcean

EnOcean for USA/ Canada: 902 MHz

Energy harvesting wireless sensor modules, Receiver and transceiver modules and accessories in 902 MHz for self-powered wireless switches, sensors and controls.


for a plethora of batteryless sensors focused on building automation (room occupancy/environment/security).

EnOcean
